statements: SELECT * FROM bioplastic_production;
SELECT process_name, organic_material_used, energy_consumption FROM bioplastic_production;
SELECT id, process_name, emissions_generated FROM bioplastic_production ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM bioplastic_production WHERE energy_consumption > 100;
SELECT id, water_usage FROM bioplastic_production WHERE emissions_generated < 5 ORDER BY water_usage ASC;
SELECT * FROM bioplastic_production WHERE energy_consumption > 100 ORDER BY emissions_generated DESC, water_usage ASC
SELECT process_name, energy_consumption, water_usage FROM bioplastic_production WHERE organic_material_used = 'Corn Starch'
SELECT id, process_name FROM bioplastic_production WHERE emissions_generated < 50
SELECT * FROM bioplastic_production ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT AVG(energy_consumption) AS avg_energy_consumption, AVG(emissions_generated) AS avg_emissions_generated FROM bioplastic_production
SELECT * FROM bioplastic_production_processes;
SELECT process_name, production_date FROM bioplastic_production_processes ORDER BY production_date DESC;
SELECT raw_material, environmental_impact FROM bioplastic_production_processes WHERE environmental_impact > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM lifecycle_assessment WHERE efficiency > 0.8;
SELECT process_name, assessment_date FROM lifecycle_assessment ORDER BY assessment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM bioplastic_production_processes;
SELECT process_name, production_date FROM bioplastic_production_processes WHERE environmental_impact > 0.5;
SELECT process_name, raw_material, production_date FROM bioplastic_production_processes ORDER BY production_date DESC;
SELECT process_name, raw_material FROM bioplastic_production_processes WHERE raw_material LIKE '%starch%';
SELECT * FROM lifecycle_assessment JOIN bioplastic_production_processes ON lifecycle_assessment.process_id = bioplastic_production_processes.id WHERE emissions_reduction >= 0.2;
SELECT * FROM bioplastic_materials;
SELECT material_name, environmental_impact_score FROM bioplastic_materials WHERE material_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM production_facilities WHERE certification_status = TRUE;
SELECT facility_name, location FROM production_facilities WHERE location = 'Europe';

SELECT material_name, carbon_footprint FROM bioplastic_materials JOIN production_processes ON bioplastic_materials.material_id = production_processes.material_id WHERE production_processes.production_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT material_name, production_method FROM bioplastic_materials;
SELECT * FROM production_facilities WHERE certification_status = TRUE;
SELECT material_name, production_date, carbon_footprint FROM bioplastic_materials JOIN production_processes ON bioplastic_materials.material_id = production_processes.material_id;
SELECT facility_name, location FROM production_facilities WHERE certification_status = FALSE ORDER BY facility_name ASC;

SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_materials, AVG(carbon_footprint) AS avg_carbon_footprint FROM bioplastic_materials JOIN production_processes ON bioplastic_materials.material_id = production_processes.material_id;
SELECT * FROM bioplastic_production_processes;
SELECT process_name, process_description FROM bioplastic_production_processes;
SELECT material_name, material_type, material_source FROM bioplastic_materials;
SELECT data_id, carbon_footprint, energy_consumption, water_usage FROM environmental_impact_data;
SELECT assessment_date, assessment_result FROM lifecycle_assessment;
SELECT * FROM bioplastic_production_processes;
SELECT process_name, process_description FROM bioplastic_production_processes ORDER BY process_name DESC;
SELECT material_name, material_type, material_source FROM bioplastic_materials WHERE material_type='biodegradable';

SELECT process_name, material_name, carbon_footprint, energy_consumption FROM bioplastic_production_processes JOIN environmental_impact_data ON bioplastic_production_processes.process_id = environmental_impact_data.process_id;
SELECT assessment_id, assessment_date, assessment_result FROM lifecycle_assessment WHERE assessment_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM bioplastic_materials;
SELECT material_name, production_method FROM bioplastic_materials WHERE impact_score > 0.5;
SELECT site_name, location FROM production_sites ORDER BY site_name DESC;
SELECT process_name, duration FROM manufacturing_processes WHERE energy_consumption < 100 ORDER BY duration ASC;
SELECT category_name, value FROM impact_categories JOIN impact_measurements ON impact_categories.category_id = impact_measurements.category_id;
SELECT * FROM bioplastic_materials WHERE impact_score > 0.5;
SELECT material_name, production_method FROM bioplastic_materials ORDER BY impact_score DESC;
SELECT site_name, location FROM production_sites WHERE capacity > 1000 ORDER BY site_name ASC;
SELECT process_name, duration, energy_consumption FROM manufacturing_processes WHERE duration < 5 AND energy_consumption > 50 ORDER BY process_name;

SELECT m.material_name, p.process_name, im.value FROM bioplastic_materials m JOIN impact_measurements im ON m.material_id = im.material_id JOIN manufacturing_processes p ON im.process_id = p.process_id WHERE im.value > 0.1 ORDER BY m.material_name ASC, p.process_name DESC;
